title: panic: failed to send request to peer: max dial attempts exceeded
body:
This is what I got when I ran `docker run -d -it -v $HOME/prysm:/data -p 4000:4000 -p 13000:13000 --name beacon-node   gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:latest   --datadir=/data` :

``` ruby
[2020-02-12 15:14:13]  INFO blockchain: Executing state transition on block root=0x87d93d66... slot=240512
[2020-02-12 15:14:16]  INFO blockchain: Starting next epoch epoch=7516 finalizedEpoch=7507 justifiedEpoch=7514 previousJustifiedEpoch=7513
[2020-02-12 15:14:16]  INFO blockchain: Validator registry information activeValidators=39008 averageBalance=3.16891 ETH totalValidators=41625
[2020-02-12 15:14:16]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=60 deposits=0 slot=240512
panic: failed to send request to peer: max dial attempts exceeded

goroutine 187 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start(0xc010787c70)
	beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:129 +0xd0d
created by github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared.(*ServiceRegistry).StartAll
	shared/service_registry.go:44 +0x23e
```
@farazdagi has this been resolved in the new initial sync?
I still face the same issue
@GuillaumeOcculy are you sure you've pulled the latest docker image?
@GuillaumeOcculy please let us know if your issue has been resolved, thank you
